details.title: Tracking Performance of a Monopulse Radar in the Presence of Multiple Targets
details.abstract: The equations derived by A. J. Rainal for the probability density function of the angle error output of a monopulse radar excited by a Gaussian signal and Gaussian thermal noise are generalized to include the presence of multiple targets. The examples given demonstrate the radar's behavior for various combinations of target and noise parameters.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
